title: League won't Launch
body: I'm using the old client and whenever i hit "Launch" nothing happens.  It was fine yesterday and everyday prior.  Today i woke up unable to play.  Any ideas?

replies.body: A pc setting or windows update may have changed some of your security options and could be blocking the client from launching.  To start, try the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access is being allowed.  Let me know if it helps!
